name: Slushgiving
description:
Slushgiving is a short, 2D game about giving your neighbors gifts in the winter time. Play as Wren, a crafty young kid full to the brim with personality. Combine items at your workbench to give both of your new neighbors a gift made especially for them. 

A game made by Aviva (twt:@AvivaKitty), Murdoch Longcoat (ig:@choasblast03), Ruby (graphiteonwhite@gmail.com), Cindy Cao, and Caity Nitahara.
